hat is the outlook for Neuronal Migration Disorders ?,The prognosis for children with NMDs varies depending on the specific disorder and the degree of brain abnormality and subsequent neurological signs and symptoms.,NINDS,Neuronal Migration Disorders
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Neuronal Migration Disorders ?,The NINDS conducts and supports a wide range of studies that explore the complex systems of brain development. These studies include the identification of the mecha
